title: quantec
text: quantec library wrapper around EasyData data portal Quantec maintained Bureau Economic Research. homepage {quantec} R package https://github.com/Bureau--Economic-Research/quantec. NOTE: API currently BETA testing. ðŸ’¡ Please good digital citizen interacting API - restrict parallel implementation institute sleeps calling data.

title: quantec
text: package way endorsed Quantec developed Bureau Economic Research order streamline research process.

title: quantec
text: Quantec Website Quantec consultancy providing economic financial data, country intelligence quantitative analytical software. Please reach Quantec via Contact Page https://www.quantec.co.za/contact/ receive API key.

title: quantec
text: package currently provides interface Quantec data API. function quantec_get_data following options: time_series_code time series code return, NMS-EC_BUS,NMS-GA_BUS freq frequency return M, Q start_year year start end_year year end respformat return csv json log_file log file output parallel is_tidy tidyformat easy read want turn logging:
code: library(quantec) library(logger)  quantec_get_data(time_series_code = "NMS-EC_BUS",                   freq = "A",                   start_year = 2000,                   end_year = 2022)  # A tibble: 29 Ã— 6                                                                                                                                                                                                     #    title                                                                    unit                           source code           date       value #    <chr>                                                                    <chr>                          <chr>  <chr>          <date>     <dbl> #  1 SACU domestic sales - NOTE: API currently BETA testing. ðŸ’¡ Please good digital citizen interacting API - restrict parallel implementation institute sleeps calling data.

title: R wrapper for quantec API
text: package currently provides interface Quantec data API. function quantec_get_data following options: time_series_code time series code return, NMS-EC_BUS,NMS-GA_BUS freq frequency return M, Q start_year year start end_year year end respformat return csv json log_file log file output is_tidy tidyformat easy read want turn logging:

title: Get Quantec Data â€” quantec_get_data
text: Get timeseries specifying comma seperated code(s).

title: Get Quantec Data â€” quantec_get_data
code: quantec_get_data(   time_series_code,   freq = c("M", "Q", "A")[1],   start_year = "1900-01-01",   end_year = Sys.Date(),   respformat = c("csv", "json")[1],   log_file,   is_tidy = TRUE )
